summary: A sneak and archer focused Nord follower; available in UNP, CBBE, and SeveNBase; with or without armor.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Verdana][color=#1e84cc][size=6][b]Eerika[/b][/size][/color]

[i][color=#c9daf8]~Ruling Forever~[/color][/i]

(Follower based on [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/4737604/?]Fortune5150's[/url] preset provided privately)

[color=#efefef][size=3][i]She's humorous, honest, jovial and perhaps a little too lonely. This is to be expected from somebody with her position.

She was born in an average family in a wealthy village. She lived without worry until she was about 15 years old, but at that point things changed.

She moved to another country and was making many new friends. Alongside trusted friends, she fulfilled dreams in a outlandish world. But with her honesty and charm, there's nothing to stop her from going beyond expectations. She could quickly become a great leader, perhaps even of the nation.

But there may be more to it than this; she is currently enjoying the world and its beauty. She feels like there's more to experience in this world. Luckily she has wise teachers and great friends to support her.[/i][/size][/color]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/5q4j4q687/20161024233032_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
Name:  Eerika
Race:  Custom Nord Race
Voice:  Female Sultry
Marriageable:  Yes
Height:  1
Weight: .69
Body:  Base UNP, CBBE, SeveNBase
Skin:  Demoniac (2K)
Armor:  Wolf Armor
Weapon:  Runed Nordic Bow & Arrows
Location:  Drunken Huntsman - Whiterun

Class:  Combat Ranger
Style:  Missile

Levels with player.  Nord traits/bonuses.
Skill Bonuses:  Conjuration, Illusion, Restoration, Alteration, Sneak, Archery, One-Hand
Complete Perk Trees:  Sneak & Archery

Tested with AFT & EFF
ENBs:  RealVision & Vividian

*Preset now added with Fortune5150's permission*

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/nntum9urr/20161024233657_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img]
For Armor Version Only:

Dragonborn
HDT Compatible Skeleton such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img]

Manual or your favorite mod manager

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/w0kqxw2yv/Many_Thanks_To.png[/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/4737604/?]Fortune5150[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/8r3pgoykn/Q&A.png[/img]
Q:  Why do a Q & A?
A:  I have no freaking clue

Q:  Why do you make so many followers?
A:  I'm a follower hoarder/addict; since there is no Followers Anon I only have Nexus.

Q:  Will you change *insert request here*
A:  Anything related to the appearance then I will not change without the permission of Fortune5150.

Q:  Do you take requests, suggestions, complaints?
A:  I'm open to all requests, suggestions, and feedback as long as they are polite.

Q:  Would you consider turning my preset into a follower?
A:  Sure, what'cha got.

Q:  Why isn't this Q & A funny?
A:  Because I'm a boring person *shrugs shoulders*
